title: Classical Performance - Sarasota Opera - November 7, 2014
teaser: The 2014 Fall season from the Sarasota Opera is underway, and you can hear some highlights from their production of Pagliacci including the much loved aria Vesti la Giubba sung by tenor Michael Robert Hendrick live on Classical WSMR.  Maestro Victor DeRenzi joins Bethany Cagle to talk about this yearâ€™s season, and other Sarasota Opera events.  Live music and conversation on Classical WSMR 89.1 in Sarasota and 103.9 FM in Tampa. Online at wsmr.org.
